about_the_game: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF. And what's more, she's appearing in Santa Costume. She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.
detailed_description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF. And what's more, she's appearing in Santa Costume. She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.
